zhēn

item.Q:

1: abruptly; hurriedly
2: die; soldier
item.A: 1: cù 2: zú

lotus; abbr. for the Netherlands (Holland)
item.A:

traditional: 魯迅
LǔXùn Lu Xun (1881-1936), one of the earliest and best-known modern Chinese writers
lǔxùn Lu Xun

traditional: 偵查
zhēnchá detect; investigate

traditional: 趨勢
qūshì trend; tendency
chénzhòng heavy; hard; serious; critical

traditional: 設想
shèxiǎng imagine; assume; tentative plan
èrzhě both [of them]; neither

traditional: 新軍
xīnjūn new army
tíshēng to promote
xìnxīn confidence; faith (in sb or sth)

traditional: 那兒
nàer there
nàr where

traditional: 懷疑
huáiyí to doubt; to suspect; doubt; suspicion
zhǔchí preside over; direct

traditional: 釋放
shìfàng to release; to set free; to liberate (a prisoner); to discharge

traditional: 人體
réntǐ human body
qìyóu gas; gasoline

traditional: 機場
jīchǎng airport; management; to manage; to administer

traditional: 斷面
duànmiàn section
